overview: An impression of modern American architecture with examples from all over the country. It starts with Philip Johnson's very original glass house in New Canaan, Connecticut, and then goes on to show numerous other buildings of various types, such as office blocks, musea, private residences, educational buildings, churches, etc. Works of many famous architects are included in this graceful film, amongst them Frank Lloyd Wright and Mies van der Rohe

production_companies.name: Motion Picture Service of the United States Information Agency

title: Architecture USA
